content: ***free crochet-a-long on my blog *** introduction post 1 part one now live 2 part two now live 3 part three now live 4 beginnerfriendly easy-to-follow crochet pattern for an amigurumi plush turtle pattern with a daisy shell this turtle can be made in so many colours and being a minimal sewing pattern it s easy to whip up for your next crochet market notice you can create this turtle with any textured yarn as the yarn option and hook size are indicated within the pattern dolce velvet from yarn art was used to design this pattern colour p pink 40g / 48m colour y yellow 25g/ 30m colour g green 40g/48m 4mm crochet hook the finished daisy turtle in the recommended yarn is 25cm pattern ♣ written only in english us terms ♠ fully photo-illustrated ♦ easy to follow with clear instructions on where to insert the eyes ◘ printer-friendly - can be printed in black and white or colour ♣ upon purchase you will receive one pdf file for the pattern contact me email admin@yarnoverwithnatasha co za please follow me on social media @yarnoverwithnatasha for upcoming patterns 1 https //yarnoverwithnatasha co za/2024/09/09/daisy-turtle-free-crochet-a-long-introduction/ 2 https //yarnoverwithnatasha co za/2024/09/16/daisy-the-turtle-part-one-crochet-a-long 3 https //yarnoverwithnatasha co za/2024/09/20/daisy-turtle-part-two-free-crochet-a-long 4 https //yarnoverwithnatasha co za/2024/09/24/daisy-the-turtle-part-three-free-crochet-a-long
